original_text: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
korean_text: 이 편지를 너희에게서 읽은 후에 라오디게아인의 교회에서도 읽게 하고 또 라오디게아로부터 오는 편지를 너희도 읽으라

sentences.original_text: And when this epistle is read among you
sentences.korean_translation: 이 서신이 너희 중에서 읽혀질 때

sentences.original_text: cause that it be read also in church of the Laodiceans
and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea
